data.text:
Bed is very comfortable 
Food is very nice
Room is clean
Room size and all same like pictures in Google
24 hours housekeeping assist
Kind and humble staff
Always safe background 
Very convenient location for metro and malls
Thank you for everything

Thank you niwanthi and all front office team for your kind assistance 

Will come back soon
data.title: Perfect

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experience during your recent stay at our hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that we were able to meet your expectations.
It's truly rewarding to know that our team's efforts in providing exceptional service did not go unnoticed. We appreciate your kind words about our facilities, amenities, and the overall atmosphere of the hotel. Our goal is to create memorable experiences for our guests, and we're thrilled to have achieved that for you.
We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back on your future visits. If there's anything specific you would like to share or any suggestions for improvement, please feel free to let us know. Your feedback is invaluable to us as we continuously strive to enhance our guest experience.
Once again, thank you for choosing Al Khoory Inn Hotel. We look forward to serving you again in the near future.
Best regards,
Leslie James.
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Leslie James

We were so tired and she treated us in a sooooo nice way‚Ä¶

data.text:
This was a great stay 

I want to thank you all the staff first of all because they are doing a great job 
Housekeeping restaurant and front office all staff are very very professional 

Rooms are amazing 

We got 3 rooms for our family and if we come back we will stay in this hotel only

Special thank is for niwanthi..cuz she gave us an early check in for our 3 rooms and she used to call everyday to check weather we everything is fine..thank you so much niwanthi 

We will come back alkhoory
data.title: Perfect alkhoory
